price: O gün, her ümmet içinden âyetlerimizi yalan sayanlardan bir cemaat toplarız da onlar toplu olarak (hesap yerine) sevkedilirler.
arabic: وَيَوۡمَ نَحۡشُرُ مِن كُلِّ أُمَّةٖ فَوۡجٗا مِّمَّن يُكَذِّبُ بِـَٔايَٰتِنَا فَهُمۡ يُوزَعُونَ

version.title: Turkish Translation - Ali Ozek
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Turkish by a group of scholars. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: wayawma naḥshuru min kulli ummatin fawjan mimman yukadhibu biāyātinā fahum yūzaʿūna
